about_the_game:
Embark on a journey of self-reliance in "The Hunter," a game where survival is your ultimate goal.
Developed by a single creator in their spare time, this immersive experience invites you to explore vast, natural landscapes, relying on your hunting and gathering skills to sustain yourself.
Collect resources to build your base, ensuring you have a place to rest and store your essentials.
Every decision you make could be the difference between life and death in this unforgiving wilderness.
Are you the Hunter or will you be Hunted?

Any content seen in videos, and/or screenshots is subject to change and may or may not be available at a later date.

content_descriptors.notes:
"The Hunter" features realistic survival mechanics, including the possibility of player death if the character fails to eat or drink. This is a gameplay mechanic intended to simulate the challenges of survival in the wild, rather than a depiction of self-harm.

The game also includes depictions of animal violence, such as hunting and skinning animals for resources, and may feature items related to drugs and alcohol as part of the survival and resource management systems.

There are no depictions of sexual acts, sexual assault, or intentional self-harm.

Players who may be sensitive to animal violence, the presence of drug and alcohol items, or the survival mechanics should be aware of these elements before playing.
